QuestData.Title: A Rediscovered Legend
QuestData.Description: This Sparring Arena is a good start, but we will need trainers to help mold your forces into worthy fighters.$b$bThere has been a reported spotting of a draenei to the west who matches the description of Akaani.$b$bThis is interesting, as we all believed her dead. She was one of the finest warriors the draenei have ever fielded and a master of nearly any weapon forged or found.$b$bCommander, you could not ask for a more skilled trainer. I advise seeking her out, if it is really her...
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Gladiator Akaani near Stonemaul Arena in Gorgrond.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Gladiator Akaani near Stonemaul Arena in Gorgrond.
QuestData.RewardText: You do not have the look of a Stonemaul bounty hunter.$b$bWe escaped the clutches of their vile arena but at a heavy cost. We were forced to leave too many allies behind and too many ogres breathing.$b$bWe could use a fresh face, one that is unknown to the ogres.
